DataElement.preferredName: Subject Continue Clinical Study Trial Screening Discontinued Trial Screening Reason
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The reason the subject discontinued the trial screening.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Subject Continue Clinical Study Trial Screening
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Some matter, situation, or event that is thought about, written about, or discussed._Remain in force or carry on without letup; keep or maintain in unaltered condition; exist in time or space without stop or interruption._Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, mechanism of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiology, behavior and health services research._A process of active consideration of potential subjects for enrollment in a trial.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Some matter, situation, or event that is thought about, written about, or discussed.

Concepts.definition: Some matter, situation, or event that is thought about, written about, or discussed.

Property.preferredDefinition: Remain in force or carry on without letup; keep or maintain in unaltered condition; exist in time or space without stop or interruption.:Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, mechanism of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiology, behavior and health services research. :A process of active consideration of potential subjects for enrollment in a trial.

Concepts.definition: Remain in force or carry on without letup; keep or maintain in unaltered condition; exist in time or space without stop or interruption.

Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.
A process of active consideration of potential subjects for enrollment in a trial.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Discontinued; stopped permanently or temporarily._A process of active consideration of potential subjects for enrollment in a trial._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is unable to do something._To take, accept, or get something offered._Any natural, endogenously-derived, synthetic or semi-synthetic compound with pharmacologic activity. A pharmacologic substance has one or more specific mechanism of action(s) through which it exerts one or more effect(s) on the human or animal body. They can be used to potentially prevent, diagnose, treat or relieve symptoms of a disease. Formulation specific agents and some combination agents are also classified as pharmacologic substances.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is unable to do something.
To take, accept, or get something offered.

Any natural, endogenously-derived, synthetic or semi-synthetic compound with pharmacologic activity. A pharmacologic substance has one or more specific mechanism of action(s) through which it exerts one or more effect(s) on the human or animal body. They can be used to potentially prevent, diagnose, treat or relieve symptoms of a disease. Formulation specific agents and some combination agents are also classified as pharmacologic substances.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: When the permission to do something is rescinded or withdrawn.

Concepts.definition: When the permission to do something is rescinded or withdrawn.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._The ability to respond to physical stimuli or to register small physical amounts or differences._The state or quality of being disqualified by law, rule, or provision.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
The ability to respond to physical stimuli or to register small physical amounts or differences.
The state or quality of being disqualified by law, rule, or provision.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts and/or supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures.  The investigator monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject).  The investigator collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements._The freedom or authority to act according to one's own judgment.

Concepts.definition: An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts and/or supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures.  The investigator monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject).  The investigator collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements.
The freedom or authority to act according to one's own judgment.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The state or quality of being disqualified by law, rule, or provision.

Concepts.definition: The state or quality of being disqualified by law, rule, or provision.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Discontinued; stopped permanently or temporarily.:A process of active consideration of potential subjects for enrollment in a trial.:An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

Concepts.definition: To stop or end, permanently or temporarily.
A process of active consideration of potential subjects for enrollment in a trial.
An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.
